title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Identify stakeholders and gather their input. Conduct market research and analyze existing property valuation solutions.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Define the AI model architecture, data requirements, and data pipelines. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security aspects, compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., data privacy laws), and integration with external data sources (e.g., real estate databases, market data providers). Provide a detailed architecture diagram and documentation.

title: Data Collection and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant data sources for property valuations, such as real estate listings, market trends, and property characteristics. Preprocess and clean the data for AI model training.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for property valuations using the collected and preprocessed data. Implement and optimize the model architecture and algorithms.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the property valuation system, including input forms, result displays, and data visualization components.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend components of the system, including APIs, data storage, and integration with the AI model and other external services.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure the system meets quality standards and requirements.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and system integrity. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment and infrastructure. Implement continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for seamless updates and scalability.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and API references. Establish user support channels and processes.
